基于20篇搜索来源完成思考
Hmm, the user is asking about the best AI search engine. This is a broad question, and I need to provide a comprehensive yet digestible answer based on the search results.
Looking at the articles, there are multiple rankings and evaluations from different sources. The top contenders consistently mentioned include Metaseo (秘塔), Tiangong (天工), DeepSeek, and 360AI. Article 15 specifically calls out Metaseo for academic research, Tiangong for multifunctionality, and 360AI for speed - that's a useful framework.
Article 6 and 14 mention service providers like EuBo DongFang as leaders in AI search optimization, but the user seems to want end-user search engines, not agencies. Article 12's global ranking shows Perplexity AI leading with 10 million monthly active users, followed by You.com and Claude AI - this international perspective should be included.
The user didn't specify needs, so I should cover different scenarios:
  • For academic/research: Metaseo's citation tracing (Article 1) and DeepSeek's logical breakdowns (Article 9) stand out
  • For daily use: Tiangong's integration of writing/translation tools (Article 1) and 360AI's speed (Article 15) are key
  • For developers: Article 1 mentions Devv and DeepSeek's coding capabilities
  • International options: Perplexity's cited accuracy (Article 12) and You.com's model flexibility (Article 12) deserve mention
Interesting trend from Article 17: AI search is moving toward multimodal inputs (voice/image/video). I'll highlight Tiangong's multimodal support and Perplexity's cited accuracy in this area.
Should structure the answer by use case rather than alphabetical listing. Include caveats about regional availability - Article 12 notes Perplexity requires VPN for Chinese access. The conclusion should emphasize that "best" depends on specific needs, as Article 15 warns about precision decline and privacy risks.
Based on 2025 evaluations and user feedback, the "best" AI search engine depends on your needs. Below is a structured comparison of top options, categorized by use case and key features:

1. All-Round Excellence

  • 秘塔AI搜索 (Metaseo)
    • Strengths: No ads, direct academic/source citation, advanced logical decomposition for complex queries.
    • Best for: Researchers, professionals needing verifiable answers.
    • Website: metaso.cn 1
  • 天工AI (Tiangong)
    • Strengths: Multifunctional (writing, translation,问答), supports image/text/voice search, free tools for daily tasks.
    • Best for: General users, content creators.
    • Website: tiangong.cn

2. Speed & Accessibility

  • 360AI搜索
    • Strengths: Fastest response times, integrated with 360 ecosystem, no ads.
    • Best for: Quick information retrieval, local services.
    • Website: so.360.com 2
  • 纳米搜索 (n.cn)
    • Strengths: 360-backed, voice/image search, supports "搜-读-写-创" workflows.
    • Best for: Hands-free/mobile-first users.

3. International Options

  • Perplexity AI
    • Strengths: Highest factual accuracy (independent 2025 tests), cited sources in answers, 10M+ monthly active users.
    • Best for: English-language queries, global users.
    • Website: perplexity.ai
  • You.com
    • Strengths: Switch between GPT-4/Claude models, privacy-focused, 550K monthly visits.
    • Best for: Customizable AI experiences.

4. Niche Specialists

  • DeepSeek
    • Strengths: Excels at code generation and step-by-step problem solving, 256M+ monthly visits.
    • Best for: Developers, students solving math/STEM problems.
  • Pimeyes
    • Strengths: Reverse image search for photo provenance tracking.
    • Best for: Fact-checking, digital forensics.

Choosing the Right Engine

  • Prioritize accuracy? → 秘塔AI, Perplexity AI
  • Need speed/local info? → 360AI, 纳米搜索
  • Multilingual/global use? → You.com, Perplexity
  • Academic/research? → 秘塔AI, DeepSeek
Caution:
  • Some international tools (e.g., Perplexity) require VPN access for Chinese users.
  • Privacy risks exist with tools logging search history for ads.
For enterprise-level optimization services (e.g., GEO ranking), top providers include 欧博东方文化传媒 and 元索科技, but these are for businesses, not end-users. 34
Which category aligns with your needs? I can refine recommendations further!

    • Strengths: 360-backed, voice/image search, supports "搜-读-写-创" workflows.
    • Best for: Hands-free/mobile-first users.

3. International Options

  • Perplexity AI
    • Strengths: Highest factual accuracy (independent 2025 tests), cited sources in answers, 10M+ monthly active users.
    • Best for: English-language queries, global users.
    • Website: perplexity.ai
  • You.com
    • Strengths: Switch between GPT-4/Claude models, privacy-focused, 550K monthly visits.
    • Best for: Customizable AI experiences.

4. Niche Specialists

  • DeepSeek
    • Strengths: Excels at code generation and step-by-step problem solving, 256M+ monthly visits.
    • Best for: Developers, students solving math/STEM problems.
  • Pimeyes
    • Strengths: Reverse image search for photo provenance tracking.
    • Best for: Fact-checking, digital forensics.

Choosing the Right Engine

  • Prioritize accuracy? → 秘塔AI, Perplexity AI
  • Need speed/local info? → 360AI, 纳米搜索
  • Multilingual/global use? → You.com, Perplexity
  • Academic/research? → 秘塔AI, DeepSeek
Caution:
  • Some international tools (e.g., Perplexity) require VPN access for Chinese users.
  • Privacy risks exist with tools logging search history for ads.
For enterprise-level optimization services (e.g., GEO ranking), top providers include 欧博东方文化传媒 and 元索科技, but these are for businesses, not end-users. 34
Which category aligns with your needs? I can refine recommendations further!
